name: The Plinth (IGGI GAME JAM 2022)
description:
During the GGJ22. IGGI (intelligent games and games intelligence) students participated in their own themed jam of "Desirable futures". 

The Plinth was inspired from games like Populous and Black & White, with a little alchemy genre thrown in. The player finds themselves in a room of curios, with a Pratchett pocket world below. What will happen if you place items on the ominous plinth?

Made by:

George Long
Oliver Withington
Michael Saiger
Kyle Worral
